articles.author: Marina Pitofsky, USA TODAY
articles.title: Trump drops off Forbes list of America's richest people for the first time in 25 years - USA TODAY
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump was not included in Forbes’s 400 list of the richest people in the United States for the first time in 25 years.
articles.content:
Former President Donald Trump was not included on the annual Forbes 400 ranking of the wealthiest Americans – the first time he hasn’t made the cut in 25 years.

articles.title: Team NZ designer Laurie Davidson dies - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: America's Cup champions pay tribute to the brains behind Black Magic, their breakthrough boat from 1995.
articles.content:
Yacht designer Laurie Davidson, a key figure in Team New Zealands Americas Cup breakthrough, has died.
 Davidson passed away in Auckland, aged 94.
